items.title: Commit Message Helper
items.summary: Generate conventional commit messages from staged git changes.
items.author: @codexdepot
items.render_excerpt: Commit Message Helper Usage 1. Run . 2. Summarize the change in one sentence. 3. Output a Conventional Commit in format. Notes Prefer , , , , , or . Keep the subject line under 72 characters.
items.body:
# Commit Message Helper

## Usage
1. Run `git diff --staged`.
2. Summarize the change in one sentence.
3. Output a Conventional Commit in `type(scope): message` format.

## Notes
- Prefer `feat`, `fix`, `docs`, `refactor`, `test`, or `chore`.
- Keep the subject line under 72 characters.

items.title: Refactor Review Agent
items.summary: Reviews refactors for behavior regressions and missing tests.
items.author: @codexdepot
items.render_excerpt: Refactor Review Agent Usage Prompt this agent with a diff and ask for: 1. Behavior regressions. 2. Risky edge cases. 3. Missing tests before merge. Prompt You are a strict code reviewer focused on regressions, risks, and
items.body:
# Refactor Review Agent

## Usage
Prompt this agent with a diff and ask for:
1. Behavior regressions.
2. Risky edge cases.
3. Missing tests before merge.

## Prompt
You are a strict code reviewer focused on regressions, risks, and missing tests.

items.title: Issue Triage Command
items.summary: Classify incoming issues by severity, area, and next action.
items.author: @codexdepot
items.render_excerpt: Issue Triage Command Usage 1. Label issue type: , , or . 2. Set severity: , , , or . 3. Assign owner and recommend immediate next action. Output Contract Return a compact JSON object with , , , and .
items.body:
# Issue Triage Command

## Usage
1. Label issue type: `bug`, `feature`, or `question`.
2. Set severity: `low`, `medium`, `high`, or `critical`.
3. Assign owner and recommend immediate next action.

## Output Contract
Return a compact JSON object with `type`, `severity`, `owner`, and `next_action`.
